title: reconnect button note working
body: tried playing a game today, the game didn't start and i tried to reconnect but the reconnect button did nothing, got leavers penalty, great start to the season :)

replies.body: Snap that is a pretty rough way to start the season. Have you been able to troubleshoot your connection to see if you can adjust anything to make it more stable? It's possible ethernet could be the perfect solution, but it'd be worth it to [**check your firewalls/antivirus**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) as well to make sure they aren't blocking your network from reaching our servers.
